SA07n3004:1: lakṣmīr nirāmayo dīrgham āyuś ca bhavate bhavet |
SA07n3004:7: bhojaṁ bhojaṁ piśitaṁ me pāyyaṁ pāyyaṁ ca śoṇitam |
SA07n3004:8: neyaṁ neyaṁ kṛśatvaṁ māṁ śiśleṣa yakṣiṇī jarā || 3 ||
SA07n3004:10: indriyāṇāṁ balaṁ nāsti mama kutra gatā smṛtiḥ |
SA07n3004:20: kṣayaty upacakṣuṣāpi nāsti kiṁ cit prayojanam || 7 ||
SA07n3004:22: śāśvasyate yathā bhastrā niṣṭhīvati kṣaṇaṁ kṣaṇam |
SA07n3004:23: jalotkṣipto yathā mīnaḥ pāṇir bhūyaḥ pravepate || 8 ||
SA07n3004:25: aho yauvanalakṣmīr māṁ kadā cit punar eti na |
SA07n3004:28: (2) gatā matiḥ cyutā śaktir āyur yāti dinaṁ prati |
SA07n3004:29: mṛtyur āsyaṁ hi vyādāya sammukhe mama tiṣṭhati || 10 ||
SA07n3004:35: parāmṛśanti tān adya kṛmayo mūṣikā api || 12 ||
SA07n3004:44: itaḥ paraṁ kathaṁ kuryāt padyabandhaṁ rasātmakam ||15 || (4)
